alert.note: Alert for Caledonia; Eastern Addison; Eastern Franklin; Eastern Rutland; Eastern Windsor; Essex; Grand Isle; Lamoille; Orange; Orleans; Washington; Western Franklin; Western Windsor (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 24 at 3:05AM EST until January 25 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow and freezing rain expected. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches for a storm total of 2 to 4 inches and ice accumulations of one to two tenths of an inch. * WHERE...The northern Adirondacks, northern Champlain Valley, and eastern Vermont. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Isolated power outages are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Ongoing snow will lead to a slippery commute this morning. After a brief lull midday, precipitation returns as freezing rain Wednesday evening and continues into early Thursday morning before tapering off by midday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary. Remember that it only takes a glaze of ice to create hazardous travel conditions.

area.areaDesc: Caledonia; Eastern Addison; Eastern Franklin; Eastern Rutland; Eastern Windsor; Essex; Grand Isle; Lamoille; Orange; Orleans; Washington; Western Franklin; Western Windsor
